tasks.heading: Sharing
tasks.description: Repost a post or story of BTO on your social media. **

tasks.heading: Attending
tasks.description: Come attend or volunteer with us at an event.

tasks.heading: Blogging

tasks.heading: Referring
tasks.description: Refer a friend to join us.

tasks.heading: Donating
tasks.description: Donate a non-perishable food item for distribution.

tasks.heading: Donating
tasks.description: Donate clothing items such as socks, sweathers and warm blankets, for homeless shelters.

tasks.heading: Filming
tasks.description: Create a short video with friends to spread awareness about homelessness on our Instagram and YouTube.

tasks.heading: Drawing
tasks.description: Create a digital or physical art piece that can be featured on our social media.

tasks.heading: Corresponding
tasks.description: Write a short letter to a homeless individual and submit it to us via email.

tasks.heading: Connecting
tasks.description: Join our Discord channel, which is exclusive to members.

footerInfo.text: **This activity can only be done once by a member each month
